ui.panel.page-onboarding.intro: Estás preparado para despertar a túa casa, reclamar a túa privacidade e unirte a unha comunidade mundial de manitas?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.welcome.restore: Restaurar de unha copia de seguridade
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.intro: Comecemos creando unha conta de usuario.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.data.name: Nome
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.helper.pas: Escolle un contrasinal forte é único. Asegúrate de gardalo, para que non o esquezas.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.error.user: Username can only contain lowercase letters, and can not contain whitespace.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: This data is stored on your ioBroker system, though some cloud-based integrations may use this data to function.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.tit: Queres que detectemos a túa localización?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: Podemos detectar a túa localización facendo unha solicitude única a un servizo externo.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.cou: We would like to know the country your home is in, so we can use the correct units.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.loc: Nome da túa instalación de ioBroker
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.int: Estes atópanse na túa rede local. Algunhas xa están engadidas, outras poden necesitar unha configuración extra.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.let: Let’s start your private smart home adventure.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.prefe: Isto inclúe información sobre o seu sistema.
Detalles do que usas co ioBroker
Contas que conteñen o número total de puntos de datos.
Comparte informes de fallos cando se produzan erros inesperados.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.need_: Debes activar as análises básicas para que esta opción estea dispoñíbeis
ui.panel.page-onboarding.analytics.intro: Comparte información anónima da túa instalación para mellorar o ioBroker e axúdanos a convencer aos fabricantes de que engadan control local e funcións centradas na privacidade.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.upload_: Upload a backup file from your device
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.unsuppo: Please choose a ioBroker backup file (.tar)
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.details: This backup does not include your ioBroker configuration, you cannot use it to restore your instance.
Your installation method doesn’t support add-ons. If you wan’t to restore these, you have to install ioBroker Operating System
The backup is encrypted. Provide the encryption key to decrypt the backup.
ioBroker Cloud is the privacy-focused cloud. We don’t store your encryption key. Enter the encryption key you saved or use the emergency kit you have downloaded.
The provided encryption key was incorrect, please try again.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.restore: Backup does not contain ioBroker data. To restore ioBroker you need a backup of ioBroker core.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.in_prog: The restore process is running in the background. ioBroker will automatically start again once the restore is complete. Please be patient, this can take a while. Do not close or refresh this page.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.failed_: The backup could not be restored. Please try again.
The last restore attempt failed. Please try it again.
The last restore attempt failed, because the encryption key was incorrect. Please try it again.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.name: Nome do copia de seguridade
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.confirm: Confirma o contrasinal de copia de seguridade

The backup will be restored. Depending on the size of the backup, this can take up to 45 min. ioBroker needs to shutdown and the restore progress is running in the background. If it succeeds, ioBroker will automatically start again and you see the login screen. If it fails it will bring you back to the onboarding.
Depending on the size of the backup, this can take up to 45 minutes. ioBroker will restart and you will see the login screen when it’s restored.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.restore: Failed to start restore. Unknown error.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.cancel_: Are you sure you want to cancel the restore process and return to the onboarding?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.restore.ha-clou: Restore from your ioBroker Cloud backup.
This ioBroker Cloud account doesn’t have a backup stored. You can learn more how Cloud backups work at the Nabu Casa website.
Jelentkezz be a Nabu Casa fiókodba és állítds helyre a ioBroker Cloud biztonsági mentésed.
You need to confirm your email before logging in.
You need to enter your two-factor authentication code.
Multi-factor authentication expired, or not started. Please try again.
Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
